solution.text:
Aggregate marks scored by Karan in Maths=\(_{{m+Decimal('0.4')}}_\)
Marks scored by Karan in Physics=\(_{{n+Decimal('0.7')}}_\)
Marks scored by Karan in Chemistry=\(_{{o+Decimal('0.1')}}_\)
The sum of all the marks = \(_{{m+n+o+Decimal('0.4')+Decimal('0.7')+Decimal('0.1')}}_\)
Total number of observations here = 3
Thus, Average Score\(=_{{trunc( (m+n+o+Decimal('0.4')+Decimal('0.7')+Decimal('0.1'))/3, 2 )}}_\)

content.text: Karan scored \(_{{m + Decimal('0.4')}}_\) in Maths, \(_{{n + Decimal('0.7')}}_\) in Physics and \(_{{o + Decimal('0.1')}}_\) in Chemistry. What was his average score?
